---
title: Dehiscence
subtitle: The splitting or opening of a wound
---

Dehiscence is defined as the splitting or opening of a wound

# Sternal Dehiscence

Especially a concern with median sternotomies

Prevention:

- Sternal precautions are created to avoid dehiscence
- But there is limited evidence on dehiscence risk reduction

Risk for sternal dehiscence

- Obesity
- Large breasts (men or women)
- COPD (pressure of coughing)
- Diabetes (delayed healing)
- Smoke
- Vascular disease
